General.Name: Shanghai Ganglian E Commerce
General.Description: Shanghai Ganglian E-Commerce Holdings Co., Ltd. provide business information, and data and index research services for the bulk commodity industries in the People's Republic of China. The company offers consulting, upstream and downstream industry research, warehousing and processing, logistics, supply chain, and payment services, as well as steel product services. It also operates banksteel.com, a steel and silver steel spot online trading platform. In addition, the company provides various products and services for metals, commodities, and other markets. Its services cover various commodities, such as ferrous and nonferrous metals, energy, chemical, building materials, agricultural products, etc. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
